description: Shows black screen on Zorin (Ubuntu based) after importing/opening mp4 video. It's like driving blind. Useless.
It's very finicky with files, and very simplistic in its approach, so I don't really think it's practical.
summary: More like Imovie than a real editor program-crashy

description: It meets my need for a simple application that allows me to trim videos before uploading. The best part is that it doesn't render the exported clip so the new file is not twice the size of the orginal.
Tried to drop an .mkv file. Shows black screen only.
Nice and stable. Does what I expect it to do. Easy user interface.
summary: Easy to use and gets the job done

description: LosslessCut is a GUI frontend for the advanced and notoriously technical ffmpeg. Graphic formats are complicated! An HTML5 viewer is used which may not display files that ffmpeg can otherwise handle. Please read the Unsupported Files section in author's guide on his web site. I would never be able to take advantage of the incredible ffmpeg without Losslesscut.
summary: Unsupported files can be converted to a friendly format

description: This app was the only one that works for huge file to edit. Working fine.
summary: Hard to control, but works fine

description: Once you've understood how to set the start and end moments (using the keyboard keys "i" and "o"), lightning fast to cut videos. Also super handy to easily concatenate different video files.
Apparently MP4 is an unsupported format.
Really!! :-) yeah
I was so impressed with this software on Windows and now on Ubuntu, it is my absoluty go to for combining and cutting video.
summary: Insanely fast and incredibly easy to use

description:
Works great for Video Cut and Cut +merge , However Merge files for several videos still problem.
For those who said not working: Video file should be copied first to any Linux Home folder then you just dragged it to the app
When trying to open some well known media file (e.g. MP3, MP4, mpg..), getting the message "Unsupportd". The application is not useable. Removed it.
JUst amazing. I had no idea this existed.

I like being able to use Snaps/Flatpaks that plug into my applications menu, but @ October 2020, ver 3.22... doesn't support WebM, for example. The latest AppImage is ver 3.23.8 does!
Both versions can save you a ton of time versus re-encoding, but check the output, because there are key-frame issues that introduce errors into the files.
Love this program despite its warts, it's a great execution of a very useful tool option!
summary: I got Better File Support using latest AppImage

description: Exactly what it says on the tin.

Needed to cut a clip out of a long video and convert from MOV to MP4. Found this in Ubuntu Software, installed it, got what I wanted within 10 minutes of starting. Straightforward and simple enough to be effective. It just _works_.
I wanted to extract a clip from an audio fie. This worked fine and was easy to use. Although was not exporting to a file until the output format was changed.

I'm using the snap version of this on Kubuntu 20.04, and it's still impressively fast. It exports & merges sections of a 2hr vid in under a minute (the last time I tried to merge videos in Kdenlive it took an hour).

My only complaint is that the UI is a little cluttered and it's not obvious where some settings are or what everything does. But the most common functionality is intuitive & front-and-centre enough that the app still easy to use.

Echo what Sean said (26th Nov review) except that it only took 3 minutes from clicking install to obtaining exported edited video clip. Why can't everything be this simple. This is the easiest editing tool I've used, and I've tried many on Windows, Linux, Android. Well done devs.
summary: Finally, something that makes extracting clips really easy !

description: It does the job promised and it does it really fast. I had to cut off a few small segments from a zoom webinar, and although I didn't cut on keyframes it did the job very nicely, and merged the rest in a matter of seconds. If I had to reencode it would have taked for ages. I am giving only 4 stars because audio is not played back in the app, nevertheless it was edited along with the video.
summary: It does the job promised and it does it really fast

description: It would be nice if it had more features like speeding up or slowing down clips.
summary: nice and simple and it works

description: I used the default settings and LosslessCut did exactly what I expected.
summary: Had to cut a few seconds off the beginning of a clip

description: Does what it says, worked great for me.

What might help for "Black screen problem" is: File => Convert to supported format.
Easy to use program. Doesn't work always super perfect, but mainly yes!
I like it!
Without audio, and with a fairly innacurate frame cut, it's rather hard to use, but it does work.

I only needed to clip out some extra dead space in a zoom recording of a lecture (mp4 format). I know zero about video editing, but a few minutes on the help page allowed me to do the job. Thank you for making this one bit of my life easier.
summary: Works well for simple clipping tasks

description: A nice piece of software that saves me some FFmpeg lines of writing. I miss only two things: Some simple transition effects and the possibility to add a soundtrack that can fade in and out. Then it would be perfect.

Worked perfectly with every video I threw at it no matter where it came from or how large the file was. If you just need to trim videos without the fuss of a far more capable program then install this.

Ubuntu 21.04
i prefer shotcut...drag drop multiple tracks export to mp4 simple. this is so clunky
Excellent to edit your screen recorded porn. I love it.
Quick and accurate cut and export with multiple options

Looks like it could be ok but it won't directly load any videos stored on my usb hard drives. I had to copy videos from usb drive to main drive, edit the video with this software then copy back from my main drive to my usb drive. That adds two steps the process that many other editors don't. That may be ok to some if only editing the occasional video but it's not for me.
Nice simple clean quick video editor, also capturing Screenshots from video, good software !!
All I wanted to do was trim down my screencasts, to remove the time when I'm opening the menu to close the video, etc. This is perfect. I'm sure other things could do it, but this is so much simpler.
It works fine on my ubuntu 20.04.
Worked like a charm for cutting hour long videos from my phone into smaller sections.
summary: Easy to use, cuts are quick

description: Works as it should, simple and efficient
This did exactly what it said on the tin, and it only took a few seconds to work out how do it. That's cool. Glad it's packaged as a snap.
I have got the latest .AppImage from github lately, setting up my new Ubuntu, so prolly gonna get it from here in few weeks to keep it up to date!
its nice to have a gui based video/audio editing tool

Macht problemlos genau das was man meistens braucht: aus einzelnen Clips (z.B. von der GoPro) Segmente herausschneiden, Ausschnitte zusammengehängt speichern und einzelne Clips zu einem File zusammenfügen. Mehr brauch ich normalerweise nicht. Lernkurve: 5 Minuten. Und das Programm arbeitet wirklich flott, ohne Herumkonvertiererei und dadurch tatsächlich verlustfrei.
La uso para cortar videos. Rapidísimo.
summary: Simplemente hace lo que dice su nombre

description: Es fácil de usar, intuitivo. Es posible cortar varios segmentos a la vez.
Corta por donde le sale de las narices. Una bonita forma de perder el tiempo.
Perfecto para cortar videos pesados por la mitad
summary: El mejor que he utilizado y el mas rapido

description: fait le job, même si les icones ne sont pas tres parlantes.

Pris en main en 5mn en ayant essayé les icones un à un .
Très rapide et aucun décalage image-son
Plus rapide que Handbrake et beaucoup d'autre program pour editer des video.
Gère très mal les sous-titres
Спасибо за программу!Очень практичный инструмент.Правда не хватает плагинов.И хотелось в обновлениях увидить больше профиссиональных инстркментвов.Разработчикам респект и удачи!
Respect to devs!
have bug with cut and merge if u need cut on miliseconds
Можно обрезать любой формат видео; есть поддержка всех необходимых кодеков:Mkv,avi,mp4.mov,mp3,HEVC... Всё работает стабильно и быстро,спасибо!
В 2 клика можно обрезать видео без лишних заморочек.
